General.Name: Shenzhen Yanmade Technology Inc
General.Description: Shenzhen Yanmade Technology Inc. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of automated and intelligent test equipment primarily in China. The company offers automated test equipment, test fixtures, FPC flexible circuit board testing equipment, accessories, and others. It operates in the United States, Japan, South Korea, Vietnam, Thailand, and internationally. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: 101, 2, 3, and 4th Floor, Building C, Shenzhen, China, 518107
